alert.note: Alert for Heard; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 4:40PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Heard and Troup Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 440 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over LaGrange, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... LaGrange, Hogansville, Corinth, Cannonville, Harrisonville, Hillcrest, Wares Crossroads, Louise, Baughs Crossroads, and Smiths Crossroad. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
